item.title: Policy mentions
item.description: Field Field Value Name Policy Mentions Can Apply To Primarily journal articles and books Metric Definition The number of times a research output has been cited in policy documents from government bodies or NGOs. Metric Calculation The total count of citations to a research output in the policy sources being tracked by the metric provider. Each provider tracks differing manually-curated lists of policy bodies.
